name: MW Digital
tagline: We don't say change order, we say no problem!
description:
MW Digital is a Michigan based technology services provider with development offices in Poland and Ukraine.
We believe that great software is not just about technology and process. Great software happens because of great relationships between people.  We seek friendly, long term relationships based on mutual trust and respect. 
We’re fun, happy, personable people – the very antithesis of the typical onshore/offshore development house.  We’re the dev guys you actually enjoy hearing from.
Our speciality areas:

HTML/JavaScript slicing/coding. Bootstrap/Angular/React


CMS frameworks: WordPress, Drupal, Umbraco, October


PHP frameworks: Laravel


Ecommerce: Magento, Woo, Shopify


iOS (Swift, Objective-C)


Managed Hosting on Linux or Windows
